summary: An outpost of Whiterun, once home to a proud Legionnaire.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Background[/b]
Resting atop a small craggy hill, is the seldom used outpost of Goldwatch. In recent years a Legionnaire has made the land his own.

[b]Description[/b]
Greetings and welcome to my second mod for Elder Scrolls Skyrim. You can find this player abode near North Brittleshin Pass. Like my previous work, this is a lore friendly themed home. This player home is also completely navmeshed, so your companions won't be left at the door feeling neglected. :P

Similar to Fort Ironcrag, the previous mod I released, some backstory to the home can be found in the journal resting on the nightstand. This player home also includes an improved set of Legionnaire armor as a bonus which can be found on the home's previous owner. I hope you'll enjoy my latest contribution to the excellent Nexus modding community, and I look forward to reading your feedback. Cheers!
author: Kraeten
